thread.title: Ex-Caloocan Mayor Boy Asistio dies at 80
thread.title_full: Ex-Caloocan Mayor Boy Asistio dies at 80

title: Ex-Caloocan Mayor Boy Asistio dies at 80

organizations.name: metro antipolo hospital and medical center

text:
Ex-Caloocan Mayor Boy Asistio dies at 80   3:02pm Former Mayor of Caloocan City Macario “Boy” Asistio Jr. passed away on Monday morning. Facebook.com/Macario "Boy" Asistio 
  Former Mayor of Caloocan City Macario “Boy” Asistio Jr. passed away on Monday morning. He was 80 years old. 
The news was confirmed by Asistio’s longtime partner, actress Nadia Montenegro on her Instagram account. She said the former politician joined the Creator at 10:55 a.m. 
“Thank you Lord for his life. Open the gates of heaven for Boy. Details of the interment will follow,” she wrote on her Instagram account. 
Montenegro, Asistio’s partner for 27 years, earlier called for prayers for her partner who was admitted to the intensive care unit of the Metro Antipolo Hospital and Medical Center for suffering coma. 
Asistio’s children, including celebrities Ynna, Alyanna, and Abby, took to Instagram to seek prayers for their father. Abby is Boy’s daughter to former actress Veronica Jones.   A photo posted by Abby Asistio (@abbyasistio) on 
Feb 3, 2017 at 6:16am PST 
The Asistios are mourning the death of the head of the family and posted a tribute for the former mayor on social media. A photo posted by Nadia montenegro (@officialnadiam) on 

Feb 5, 2017 at 9:45pm PST A photo posted by Ynna Asistio Official (@officialynnaa) on 
Feb 5, 2017 at 7:18pm PST A photo posted by Alyana Asistio (@alyanaasistio) on 
Feb 5, 2017 at 7:55pm PST 
Asistio served as the Caloocan City mayor from 1980 to 1986 and was re-elected in 1988 serving until 1995. He ran for mayor in 2013 and 2016 but he lost and failed to return to office.
